functions.name: init
functions.description: Create a new CommandConnect objects which can be execute via the CommandStack.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: the source port for the connection to create

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: the target port for the connection to create

parameters.name: dropTarget
parameters.description: the port who has initiate the connection creation. mainly the drop target

functions.name: setConnection
functions.description: set the connection to use. called by the ConnectionCreatePolicy

functions.name: getConnection
functions.description: Returns the fresh created connection if available. Used in the ClickConnectionCreatePolicy to customize the router and vertices.

functions.name: redo
functions.description: Redo the command after the user has undo this command.

functions.name: getLabel
functions.description: Returns a label of the Command. e.g. move figure.

functions.name: canExecute
functions.description: Returns [true] if the command can be execute and the execution of the command modifies the model. e.g.: a CommandMove with [startX,startX] == [endX,endY] should return false. The execution of this Command doesn't modify the model.

returns.description: return try if the command modify the model or make any relevant changes

functions.name: cancel
functions.description: Will be called if the user cancel the operation.
